af9df923.title: Admin Section UI Finalization
af9df923.description: Complete audit and finalization of all admin pages. Ensure every component works, all backend data is connected, and all functionality is properly implemented. This includes: Dashboard, Products, Orders, Customers, Content, Settings, Analytics. Verify all CRUD operations, forms, tables, filters, pagination, error handling, loading states, and responsive design.

e1dae143.title: Markdown Blog System with Cloudinary
e1dae143.description: Build complete blog system supporting markdown files, automatic image optimization via Cloudinary, SEO optimization, and excellent performance. Includes: markdown processor, Cloudinary integration, blog admin UI, listing page, post page, SEO features, search, categories/tags, social sharing, RSS feed, sitemap, and more.
